name: 10mg: Sealed Estate
description:
10mg is a collection of 10 minute long games, a tiny dose of something special.

SEALED ESTATE is psychological horror game, in which you are locked inside by a creature ready to hunt you down, whilst you figure out how to escape from the estate you have been locked inside. who lived here? who are the voices haunting your every step?



What you will find in your exploration:
  • Lights are not working in the home.
  • An enigmatic creature hunting you down.
  • other creatures laying in wait, staring at you.
